current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To authorize the transfer of certain funds to improve
		  security at United States embassies and other diplomatic facilities worldwide,
		  and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following bill;
			 which was read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Embassy Security Funds Transfer
			 Act of 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Embassy Security Funds Transfer Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

header.#text:
Transfer of
			 certain funds for improvement of security at United States embassies and other
			 diplomatic facilities worldwide

quote.#tail:
may be transferred between such
			 headings.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
title VIII of the Department of
			 State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act of 2012
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act of 2012/t:VIII

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be merged with funds in the heading to which transferred, and shall,
			 except as provided in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Embassy Security Funds Transfer Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, be available subject to the same terms and
			 conditions as the funds with which merged.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Embassy Security Funds Transfer Act of 2013/s:2/ss:b/p:2

text.#text: Any funds transferred to a heading under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be
			 available for the same period for which such funds were originally
			 appropriated.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Embassy Security Funds Transfer Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be
			 subject to the regular notification procedures of the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Embassy Security Funds Transfer Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Committees on
			 Appropriations of the Senate

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S227 : Embassy Security Funds Transfer Act of 2013
